Posts.Title: tips to reduce side effects before starting chemo, please

Posts.Content: I am starting my chemo in a few weeks 4 sessions 3 weeks apart, i have had mastectomy with reconstruction and like you am really scared, i am anxious all the time. Since getting my wig etc i think it is hitting home. I spoke to the doctor she has given me a telephone number for a self refersl councilling service, which i am goung to try. If it gets worse i will ask for medication for a few months to help me over this period. Ring your doctor i have been told this is all quite common Enjoy your holiday Maggie

Posts.Content: I have just had my first EC chemo after mastectomy and reconstruction. Have had a few side effects, heartburn and wind was quite bad but the dictor has now given me tablets very tired and hot flushes the day after chemo, bt unmanageable. I have another 3 sessions 3 weeks apart. Hair will start to fall out about 3rd week i am told. I have bought 2 wigs and some scarfs. Did not want to sit at hospital for hours so did not go for cold cap as it does not always work.
